g.text: Verify AI usage and ethical considerations
Select control standards (ISO, NIST, AI-IRB guidelines)
Set up hardware security features (firewalls, network segments)
Commit code to version control, QA checks traceability
Create user accounts, set policy (MFA, password rules)
Execute test cases on system controls
Confirm ethical compliance in system logging
Verify final deployment environment is correct
Final sign-off after verifying no unauthorized changes
Provide system transition info for training and support
Submit compliance docs for AI-IRB records
